1.wonBet2: Congratulations, you won @amount on a bet
1.wonBet3: Congratulations, you beat @user and won a bet

2.wonBet6: Congratulations, you beat @user and @user in bets

3.wonBet7: Congratulations, you beat @user and @user, and 3 others in bets

1.lostBet2: Congratulations, you won @amount on a bet
1.lostBet3: Congratulations, you beat @user and won a bet
